name: Project Lockdown
description: Project Lockdown (an initiative from The IO Foundation) is a civic tech, interactive platform providing an overview of the state of Human and Digital Rights around the globe.

SDGs.evidenceText: A convergence project between tech capacity building and open source development aimed at nurturing a Social Tech society that will demand the promotion and protection of Digital Rights and where programmers can embrace their new role as Human and Digital Rights defenders.
